STYLE.NAME: Applewine
STYLE.NOTES: Cider with substantial sugar added to achieve higher than normal alcohol levels. Entrants MUST specify carbonation level (still petillant or sparking), fruits used and sweetness (dry, medium)
STYLE.PROFILE: Lighter than other ciders due to high alcohol. Like a dry white wine. Balanced with low astringency and bitterness. Comparable in flavor and aroma to common cider. Clear to brilliant. Pale to med-gold color.
STYLE.INGREDIENTS: Apples with substantial sugar additives to raise original gravity and alcohol. High attenuation yeast.
